description: This sample survey template consists of questions that gather information about people's social media usage. Our team of experts designs this survey questionnaire on social media after carefully calibrating the attributes and personalities of people.

questions.question: Considering your complete experience with social media websites (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc.), how likely are you to recommend it to your family and friends?0 Very Unlikely to 10 Very Likely
Which of the following social media website do you currently have an account with?
How often do you check-in to your social media accounts in any given week?
In a week, which of the following social media websites do you visit most frequently?
What is your go-to device to access your social media feed?
How many friends do you have on social media (All platforms)?
How many friends from your social media website have you met in person?
On a regular day how many times do you post pictures, comments, etc. on your social media accounts?
How often do you use the chat app on your social media accounts?
Do you use your social media accounts to login to the other websites?
How many celebrities do you follow on social media?
On an average how much time do you spend on social media?
When do you access social media websites?
Do you check your social media account before going to bed?
Has social media affected your relationship with loved ones?
Do you consider yourself addicted to social media?

description: Test your knowledge of science facts and applications of scientific principles by taking our 11-question quiz. When you finish, you will be able to compare your scores with the average American and compare responses across demographic groups. Our nationally representative poll of 4,464 randomly selected U.S. adults was conducted on Pew Research Center's American Trends Panel between Jan. 7 and Jan. 21, 2019. The analysis of the findings from the poll can be found in the full report, “What Americans Know About Science.”

questions.question: Oil, natural gas and coal are examples of?
Which of these is nonliving?
All of these are types of clouds, EXCEPT:
When you boil water, what happens to the water level?
options: The water level stays the same

questions.question: A solar eclipse happens when
options: Earth moves between the moon and the sun
The moon casts a shadow over Earth
Venus moves between Earth and the Sun
Earth casts a shadow over the moon
questions.correctOption: The moon casts a shadow over Earth

questions.question: True or false: The sun is NOT a star.
The correct order of the planets from the sun is:
options: Mercury, Earth, Mars, Venus, Saturn, Jupiter, Uranus, and Neptune
Earth, Mercury, Venus, Saturn, Mars, Jupiter, Uranus, and Neptune
Mercury, Venus, Earth, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, and Neptune
Venus, Mars, Earth, Mercury, Jupiter, Saturn, Neptune, and Uranus
questions.correctOption: Mercury, Venus, Earth, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, and Neptune

questions.question: How do atoms move in a gas?
options: They vibrate and move freely about
They vibrate but do not move at all
They vibrate and slide past each other
They vibrate and move at slow speeds
questions.correctOption: They vibrate and move freely about

questions.question: Plants use photosynthesis to produce what food or energy source?
A cell's chromosomes contain what material?
What do you get when you mix an acid and a base?
Chromosomes move toward opposite ends of the cell during which phase of cell division?
Oceanic crust is _____ and _____ than continental crust.
What frequencies of electromagnetic radiation are absorbed by Earth’s ozone layer?

description: Good survey questions will help your business acquire the right information to drive growth. Surveys can be made up of different types of questions. Each type has a unique approach to gathering data

questions.question: What can you tell us about yourself? (Your age, gender, hobbies, interests, and anything else you’re willing to share)
What has kept you from signing up for our newsletter?
Which of the following are you most likely to read?
options: I don’t read on a regular basis

questions.question: What do you think about our customer service?
Which of the following products do you purchase regularly at our store? (select up to 5 answers)
Do you have experience working with Google Analytics?
Google Analytics has a steep learning curve for the average user
How do you commute to work

description: The Market Research Product Survey is your go-to solution for gathering essential insights from customers and industry experts. This user-friendly tool is designed to help businesses refine their products and services by uncovering customer preferences, analyzing market trends, and assessing competitive strengths and weaknesses. With tailored questions, demographic insights, and expert data analysis, it's the key to informed decision-making and staying ahead in today's dynamic market.

questions.question: What is your first reaction to the product
How would you rate the quality of the product
How innovative is the product?
When you think about the product, do you think of it as something you need or don't need?
How would you rate the value for money of the product?
If the product were available today, how likely would you be buying the product?
How likely is it that you would recommend our new product to a friend or colleague?
In your own words, what are the things that you like most about this new product?
In your own words, what are the things that you would most like to imporve in this new product?
